description: This RFP is issued for the purpose of obtaining Proposals for Elevator Maintenance. This is described in more detail in the Scope of Work Schedule.
full_summary:
====================================

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Title (English) / Titre (French)**
- E nterm ain for Elevator Servicing at the CN Tower
- Entretien d’ascenseurs à la Tour CN

**Reference Number**
- PW-22-01010055

#### Key Dates
- **Publication Date**
  - 2022-10-14
- **Tender Closing Date**
  - 2022-11-28T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**
  - 2022-11-21

#### Brief Description (English) / Brève description (French)
This RFP invites proposals for the provision of elevator maintenance services at the CN Tower in Toronto, Ontario.

 #### Information on Potential Contractor
The contract involves elevator maintenance for the CN Tower, with estimated dates for contract duration and completion.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact Jason Weeks:

- Email: rfp2022p06@cntower.ca
- Phone: 416-601-4754
- Location: 290 Bremner Blvd, Toronto, ON M5V 3L9

#### Relevant Attachments (see links below)

The complete RFP document with all amendments is available at the following links:

- English: [cnt-2022p06_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/14/78da9b8a6d02221d543f57954a48b4b5/cnt-2022p06_en.pdf)
- French: [cnt-2022p06_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/14/d28e59bed400543e86bdf2d30cbf5584/cnt-2022p06_fr.pdf)

Please note that this RFP has expired, and all submissions should be made in accordance with the closure date. In addition, it is essential to carefully review all attachments and amendments to ensure that you fully understand the requirements outlined in this RFP.
